issues.title: Not Found `repo/file/commit/index.html` when trying to `diff`
issues.body:
When viewing a file in repo (/repo/file/ path), `[diff]` link on the latest commit (.commit-description in tpl) will break as it has relative path in `href` attr.

To reproduce this bug, try to go here: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GitLiXB6t5r8vuU2zC6a8GYj9ME6HMQ4t/repo/file/?1H3qtUJRrghDHpY89CBeueVAZw8xbHuDLr/data/users/content.json.example@master and click [diff] link.
